text: Tridesmostemon is a genus of the plant family Sapotaceae described as a genus in 1905.Engler, Heinrich Gustav Adolf. 1905. Botanische Jahrbücher für Systematik, Pflanzengeschichte und Pflanzengeographie 38: 99-100 descriptions in Latin, commentary in German, line drawings as illustrationsTropicos, Tridesmostemon Engl. Tridesmostemon is native to western and central Africa.Kew World Checklist of Selected Plant Families ;Species # Tridesmostemon congoensis (A.Chev.) Aubrév. & Pellegr \- Gabon # Tridesmostemon omphalocarpoides Engl. \- Nigeria, Cameroon, Gabon, Cabinda, Central African Rep., West Congo, East Congo ==References== Category:Chrysophylloideae Category:Flora of Africa Category:Sapotaceae genera
title: Tridesmostemon
